title: Lake Croagh Patrick
description: This is an image on Lake Croagh Patrick, found in County Mayo, Ireland. I traveled here with my family during winter of 2024/2025, to visit family! This is a Holy Mountain: it has a small church at the peak, and some Catholics take religious pilgramages, hiking to the top!

title: Mount Tamalpais
alt: View from Mount Tamalpais in NorCal
description: Mount Tamalpais is a mountain in Northern California, near my hometown! My friends and I love to take hikes or go on picnics on this mountain in the summertime!

title: Cascade Falls
alt: Me hiking Cascade Falls, Mount Tamalpais
description: Mount Tamalpais, a mountain in Northern California, is a popuar spots for hiking and picnics. Cascade falls is one of the hikes that my friends and I like to explore, which leads to a beautiful waterfall!

title: Mount Soledad
alt: View from Mount Soledad, San Diego
description: This image shows the view from Mount Soledad, a national veterans' memorial park in San Diego that has gorgeous views of the surrounding area!

title: Gliderport
description: Gliderport is a lookout above Black's Beach in La Jolla, bordering the UCSD campus. As a UCSD student, this is a regular lookout spot to watch a pretty sunset!
